I like the wide range of characters you have to choose from.
Dear Dead by Daylight: we love and hate you and this will never change! <3 come to the darkside and enjoy the entity!

If your thinking about getting into this game or thinking if you should continue playing DONT. The devs don't care about you and only see you as dollar signs. All the changes the players have wished for years will never come because these devs are top 5 worst devs I have ever witness in my life. The community for the most part is super toxic and take pride in not only bullying people but take pride in "being good" at a game that is not made to be taken seriously to any degree especially now with all the hackers and unbalanced survivor advantage. I thought playing killer was about playing a powerful psycho but instead survivors are alot more feared with their dead heads and unbreakables etc. If your stupid enough to buy this game anyway or your too far ahead to quit pick survivor and have fun because coming from a previous killer main before the dreadful mmr update playing killer nowadays will stress you out more then it should. If not that and you still wanna play killer pick up nurse, spirit, artist, blight all the actually good killers because attempting to have fun and play a unique and maybe less powerful killer like pig or clown will just angry you and get you a flashlight to the face. People will tell you to have fun and dont get tilted and blah blah not realizing that legit every killer main out there agrees that playing killer doesn't produce any positive feelings regardless of the situation. I wanna warn others to not be like my dumb ass self and pour 200+ hours into a game they hate and don't support. Not all 200+ hours were terrible and most of those hours were before the mmr update when I can actually have fun but those days are long gone and currently I warn again do not buy this game. Not for 40 dollars, not for 20, not for 5 and not for free although this shitty game should be free with all the content you will be missing if you dont cough up that money.

I understand you don't want players to search for games for ten minutes, but I'd rather wait than lose every game. However, I lose every game. So I don't want to play this game and advise it to others.

I have played this game in another account so i have more than 1,000 hours on this game. By this point i can say that the game is fun(some times stressing) but it is fun to play on the entity realm, the thing is. This is the 3th time i'm buying this game because i always get banned. We all know that for you to enjoy this game completely you have to buy the DLC's, well, the first time i played it i bought some, but i have limited money so i couldn't buy the rest. A friend offered me a hack and i took it, instant regret when i got banned. I was very sad because i really enjoy this game so i bought it again and got banned from the void and i had done NOTHING AT ALL, if i was cheating this second time fair enought but i wasn't. Bought it a 3th time some tima later and i have about 100 hours now and i got banned again, i was playing so legit that my goal was having all the killers in the game, i bought all-kill charpter and leatherface, WHY THE FUCK DID I GOT BANNED??? Every game that you have been banned, why can't you buy the game and play it legit? The hacks that i used( More that a fucking year ago) was exclusevily for killers and to get every perk, so i was not a bad thing to play against because it as pretty normal, but i hack so i deserved it anyway, the problem here is that i got banned playing legit, how the fuck does buying the game, buying dlcs and playing nicely without being toxic or anything bad to the game or to the comunnity? Soooo you can literaly be banned from the void and thats it

Guten Tag,

ich habe mich selbst überzeugt mal eine Rezension zu schreiben. 

Dead by Daylight hat mich sehr gepackt es ist ein tolles Katz- und Maus Spiel mit viel Sucht Faktor. Gerne zu Zweit oder zu viert versuchen zu entkommen. Mit vielen Updates sowie regelmäßig neu Verfügbaren Killern sowie Überlebenden mit verschiedenen Perks macht es das Spiel immer wieder aufs neue Interessant. 

Eins macht nur keinen Spaß +++ KILLER DIE CAMPEN +++ ich hoffe euch trifft beim K4CK3N der Blitz! 

kurz und knapp: 

+Interessante Updates mit Killern und Überlebenden
+unterschiedliche Fähigkeiten für Killer und Überlebenden
+Spielspaß auch nach mehreren Spielstunden 
+Lobby Suche wurde stark verbessert und es dauert nicht mehr ewig bis ein Match zustande kommt. 
+Crossplay

-Einige offentsichtliche Bugs 
-EInige Cheater Killer ( unbegrenzte Nutzung der Hauptwaffe, extrem hohe Treffweite ... auch wenn eigentlich unmöglich)
-Internet - Lag eines einzigen Spielers oder Killers kann die Dynamik des Spielen zerstören.
--DbD wird durch die Updates immer Größer und Größer! 
-Steam Updates brauchen im Vergleich meist Länger. 

Freue mich trotzdem immer wieder in den Abendlichen Stunden ein paar Runden zu spielen. 
Auf das auch noch mehrere werden als die bisher knapp 62 Std.

Gruß 









Vielen Dank für das Lesen meiner ersten Rezension.

This game used to be good. It always had bugs and issues but I kept coming back to it and it [i] was [/i] improving slowly but surely....
The new MMR system that was supposed to [i] improve [/i] the game and reduce waiting time [b] IS [/b] what brought all of the unresolved issues back to the surface and made them even more prominent and as a result it will bury this game into the ground and the devs deserve every bit of slander for what they have done.
[b] Unless they resolve MOST of the problems that have been around for 5 years now I wouldnt recommend getting this game even if its free [/b]

Сделав перерыв длиною в год после 5000+ часов, наигранных в эту игру ранее, могу сказать, что, хоть это и прискорбно лично для меня, игра изменилась в лучшую сторону. Наконец-то начали появляться более-менее юзабельные перки в новых главах, капельку повысилось качество ДЛС, а в особенности прописывания лора в них. В принципе, игра встает обратно с колен, медленно, но верно, поэтому есть смысл ее покупать.
*чуть позже будет полноценный UPD*

So I've been playing this game on and off for a long time. I can honestly say it isn't a bad game for the casual experience, at high level gameplay though it completely falls apart. This is mostly due to the core design of the game. That's not to say I don't recommend this game, though. 

The biggest issue is this game was created with wet spaghetti noodles for the base, and continually breaks after each update because the developers won't give it the rework it needs from the ground up. They also don't tend to listen to the community about changes, and instead tend to lean HEAVILY on "the stats", which in a game like this are easily skewed depending on how you look at literally anything.

The community, while it can be great, is FULL of entitled people that for some reason think they deserve royalty treatment, and tend to call literally anything someone does toxic - unironically. They confuse inconvenience with toxicity very quickly. However, there are toxic people that do things just to be "that person". New players are harassed heavily in chat for attempting to learn the game, and belittled for not knowing things. There are the wholesome lovely people around though, and I've made a lot of really good friends from Dead by Daylight. I can honestly say though, for your first 100 or so hours playing this game - turn off the in game chat. You'll thank me.

Now, for the good - this game hits all the itches and urges for a horror buff, or just someone that wants a casual, enjoyable experience. While playing Killer is somewhat more stressful, it's rewarding. The same can be said for survivor - having a killer chase you, while at first may seem stressful, can end up being the most fun part of the game for many - myself included. There's tons of perk combinations to use, and while a lot are borderline useless, they can be used in funny and entertaining ways - the game isn't and shouldn't be about sweating your balls off and winning every single game. The developers never intended for a killer to kill all 4 survivors every game, nor did they intend all 4 survivors to escape every game - the sooner you come to terms with this, the sooner you'll enjoy this game a lot more. 

There's a vast arsenal of killers to play, all with different abilities at their disposal. Don't like this killer? No biggie, there's many more to try out until you find the one for you - and they're always adding more - 4 per year, in fact. While survivors don't have anything that really sets them apart, you'll be happy to know Cosmetic by Daylight is a real thing.

Buying survivors/killers can be done with in game currency from playing, or IRL money. However, any licensed characters MUST be bought with IRL money. This means any character from a series, such as Ghostface, Leatherface, Michael Myers, Laurie Strode, etc have to be bought with IRL money - this is due to licensing and is a contractual agreement with the license holders to get the characters in the game. 

Overall, I'd say give the game a try. It's easy to sink some hours into, and if you can play with friends it becomes an amazing party game. You'll run into bugs here and there, but if you can overlook those you'll be fine.
